parts.japanese: テム：気がつくとぼくはきみょうなきゅうでんの中にたたずんでいた。
parts.thammy: Tim: When I regained consciousness, I was standing in a bizarre palace.

parts.japanese: パラシュートが着水してからのきおくがまったくなかった…みんなは無事だろうか。
parts.thammy: I didn't have any memories from after the parachutes landed in the water... But maybe everyone's safe.

parts.japanese: テム：何か変だな。さわってもダメージを受ける気配もないし…
parts.thammy: Tim: This is something strange, isn't it? Even though I touched the enemy, I haven't taken any damage...

parts.japanese: テム：おや？右の部屋から人の気配がする…
parts.thammy: Tim: Oh? I feel a human presence from the room to the right...

parts.japanese: テム：おや？どこからかかぼそい声が聞こえるみたいだ…
parts.thammy: Tim: Oh? I can hear a weak voice coming from somewhere...

parts.japanese: 不思議な声：ここはキュウケツキの住むきゅうでん…
parts.thammy: Mysterious voice: Vampires live in this place...

parts.japanese: このきゅうでんの血の泉はまものを次々と作り出し…
parts.thammy: The fountain of blood in this palace produces demons one by one..

parts.japanese: テム：おや？左の部屋から人の気配がする…
parts.thammy: Tim: Oh? I feel a human presence from the room to the left...

parts.japanese: エリック：ここはどこ？くらいよ…さみしいよ…おかあさんたすけて…
parts.thammy: Eric: Where is this? It's bleak... It's lonely... Mom, help me...

parts.japanese: 不思議な声：きゅうでんの一番下の階には血の泉がある…
parts.thammy: Mysterious voice: The fountain of blood is on the lowest floor of the palace...

parts.japanese: そこにあの石を…はやくは.や..く…
parts.thammy: There… With that stone... Hurry, hur.rrr..ry...

parts.japanese: リリィ：わあっ！！！
parts.thammy: Lillie: Waah...!!

parts.japanese: リリィ：もう…びっくりさせないでよっ！！
parts.thammy: Lillie: Geez... Don't surprise me...!!

parts.japanese: しんぞうがのどから飛び出したらテムのせいだからねっ！！
parts.thammy: My heart nearly jumped out of my chest because of you, you know...!!

parts.japanese: リリィ：さっき他の部屋でエリックを見かけたんだけど何か変でさ。
parts.thammy: Lillie: I happened to see Eric in the other room just a bit ago, but there was something strange.

parts.japanese: 体が半分とうめいで向こうがわがすけて見えるし、
parts.thammy: Since his body was half transparent, I could see through to the other side of the room.

parts.japanese: それに話しかけてもたましいをぬきとられたみたいにまるで意識がないの…
parts.thammy: Even if I talked to him, it seemed like his soul was stolen; his entire consciousness is gone...

parts.japanese: とにかくいっしょに行動しよ。何がおこるかわからないし。
parts.thammy: Anyhow, let's work together. After all, we don't know what's going on.

parts.japanese: リリィ：テムのポケットをちょっとかりるね。
parts.thammy: Lillie: I'll borrow your pocket, alright?

parts.japanese: リリィ：さ。行こっ。
parts.thammy: Lillie: Alright. Let's go….

parts.japanese: 不思議な声：じょうか石はかんおけの中に…
parts.thammy: Mysterious voice: The purification stone in the coffin...

parts.japanese: カレン：テム….どこ？どこにいるの…？？
parts.thammy: Karen: Tim... Where? Where are you...??

parts.japanese: テム：かんおけのふたは開きそうにないな…
parts.thammy: Tim: Isn't there an opening in the coffin...?

parts.japanese: ポケットの中からリリィが話しかけてきた。
parts.thammy: Lillie started talking from Tim's pocket.

parts.japanese: リリィ：ちょっとまって。このかんおけって穴があいてるじゃない？
parts.thammy: Lillie: Wait a moment. This coffin doesn't open?

parts.japanese: あたしなら穴から中に入れそうだよね。見てこよっか？
parts.thammy: I can open it if I go into the hole. Shall I take a look?

parts.japanese: リリィ：変なの…このかんおけって内側にカギがついてるよ。どうりで開かないわけだよね。
parts.thammy: Lillie: That's strange... There's a lock inside this coffin. No wonder it doesn't open, huh?

parts.japanese: ポケットの中からリリィが話しかけてきた。
parts.thammy: Lillie started talking from Tim's pocket.

parts.japanese: リリィ：このかんおけって穴があいてるじゃない？
parts.thammy: Lillie: This coffin doesn't open?

parts.japanese: あたしなら穴から中に入れそうだよね。見てこよっか？
parts.thammy: I can open it if I go into the hole. Shall I take a look?

parts.japanese: リリィ：かんおけの中で変な石を見つけちゃった。
parts.thammy: Lillie: I discovered this weird rock in the coffin.

parts.japanese: じょうか石を手に入れた！
parts.thammy: Got the purification stone!

parts.japanese: じょうか石をかかげた！
parts.thammy: Held up the purification stone!

parts.japanese: しかし何もおこらなかった！
parts.thammy: However, nothing happened!

parts.japanese: ニール：うーんうーん。
parts.thammy: Neil: Ungh, ungh.

parts.japanese: ロブ：うーんうーん。
parts.thammy: Rob: Ungh, ungh.

parts.japanese: リリィ：あっ！血でできた泉だ…
parts.thammy: Lillie: Ah...! It's a fountain made of blood...

parts.japanese: こことさっきの石が何か関係してるのかな…？
parts.thammy: I wonder if this is somehow related to that rock we just picked up?

parts.japanese: 石はしだいにかがやきをまし泉の中へと消えていった…
parts.thammy: The stone grew brighter and immediately disappeared into the fountain...

parts.japanese: 助かったぜぼうずっ！ありがとよっ！！
parts.thammy: You saved me, boy! Thank you...!!

parts.japanese: おれはフリージアの町からこのきゅうでんへ連れてこられてまものに変えられてたんだ…
parts.thammy: They brought me to this place from Freesia and turned me into a demon...

parts.japanese: リリィがポケットの中から話しかけてきた。
parts.thammy: Lillie speaks from inside your pocket.

parts.japanese: えーっ！じゃさっきのまものたちはみんな人間だったわけ…？
parts.thammy: What...!? So the demons that we were seeing just now were humans...?

parts.japanese: さっき殺されるしゅんかんっていうのを味わったわ。死ぬことがあれほどおそろしいものだとは…
parts.thammy: I got a taste of what it's like to die just now. Having an experience even that close to death is a terrifying thing...

parts.japanese: あなたは何も知らなかったんだから罪はないけれど私たちが食料にしている動物たちもあんな気分を味わってるのかしら。
parts.thammy: It isn't your fault because you didn't know what was going on, but I wonder if the animals we eat for food also feel that sensation.

parts.japanese: おれたちゃもとドレイ商人。人身売買の罪でつかまって…
parts.thammy: We were originally slave merchants. Arrested for the crime of human trafficking...

parts.japanese: でも役人の連中はおれたちをキュウケツキに売りとばしやがった！もう何も信じられねえよ…
parts.thammy: But a damned group of bureaucrats sold us off to vampires! I still can't believe it...

parts.japanese: やれやれ…美人の女のさそいにのってついてきたらこのザマだ…
parts.thammy: Good grief... A beautiful woman invited me here and I ended up in this fantastic mess.

parts.japanese: 素敵な男がさそいをかけるからついてきたの…もう男なんて信じないっ！
parts.thammy: A handsome man asked me to come, so I came here... I still can't believe men!

parts.japanese: このカンオケでねおきしてるのはまぎれもなくキュウケツキ。やつらはとんでもねえことをたくらんでやがる…
parts.thammy: There's no doubt about it; vampires sleep and wake in these coffins. Those bastards are planning things too horrible to imagine...

parts.japanese: このきゅうでんに住んでいるのはキュウケツキの夫婦です。
parts.thammy: A vampire husband and wife couple live in this palace.

parts.japanese: いたるところから人間をつれてきてまものに変え労働力として使うっているんですよ…
parts.thammy: Humans are brought here from all over and transformed into demons to be used as a workforce...

parts.japanese: このきゅうでんはまぼろしの土地ムー大陸へとつながっているの。キュウケツキの夫婦はそこで何かをさがしてるみたい…
parts.thammy: This palace is tied to the fantastical grounds of the continent of Mu. The vampire couple seems to be searching for something there...

parts.japanese: おれたちゃまものに変わりかけのところだったから助かったがあんたがくるのがあと一歩おそかったらと思うと…
parts.thammy: Imagine if you were one step later in rescuing us from being transformed into demons...

parts.japanese: キュウケツキの夫婦の話を立聞きしたんだけどムー大陸にはミステリードールとかいう人形がねむっているらしいわ…
parts.thammy: I was eavesdropping on the vampire couple talking; it seems like a puppet called a Mystery Doll or something like that is sleeping at the continent of Mu...

parts.japanese: キュウケツキの女からカギを一個かっぱらったんだ。もっていきな。
parts.thammy: I snatched a key from the vampire woman. Bring it with you.

parts.japanese: 海底きゅうでんのカギを手に入れた！
parts.thammy: Got the seabed palace key!

parts.japanese: きゅうでんの最上階にはムー大陸へつづく通路があるらしいぜ。
parts.thammy: It seems like there is a passage that leads to the continent of Mu at the highest floor of the palace.

parts.japanese: こんな海のまんなかにおきざりになっておれたちゃ今後どうすりゃいいんだ…
parts.thammy: What should we do after left in the middle of the sea like this…?

parts.japanese: みんなでこのきゅうでんをのっとって住んじゃうっていうのはどうかしら？
parts.thammy: What will happen to everyone who was abducted and brought to this palace?

parts.japanese: きゅうでんのカギを使ってみることにした。
parts.thammy: Tried using the palace key.

parts.japanese: ポケットのリリィが話しかけてきた。
parts.thammy: Lillie begins to speak from your pocket.

parts.japanese: この先にまぼろしの大陸ムーが広がっているんだね。
parts.thammy: The passage ahead of here leads to the fantastic continent of Mu, right?

parts.japanese: ポケットの中からリリィが話しかけてきた。
parts.thammy: Lillie begins to speak from your pocket.

parts.japanese: リリィ：長い通路だよね….これほんとにムー大陸につづいてるのかな…
parts.thammy: Lillie: It's a long passage, huh... I wonder if this really goes on to the continent of Mu...
